main.sql1: SELECT (CASE WHEN 2=affair.state THEN DATE_FORMAT(affair.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m') WHEN 4=affair.state THEN DATE_FORMAT(affair.COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m') END) as '时间', COUNT(affair.id) as '数量',col.templete_Id as '模板' FROM Ctp_Affair affair INNER JOIN Col_Summary col ON affair.object_Id=col.id and affair.BODY_TYPE=20 INNER JOIN Org_Member member ON affair.member_Id=member.id AND member.id=:user WHERE affair.app=1 AND affair.state IN(:state) AND col.templete_Id IN(:templeteIds) AND (CASE WHEN 2=affair.state THEN :startTime<=DATE_FORMAT(affair.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(affair.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m')<=:endTime WHEN 4=affair.state THEN :startTime<=DATE_FORMAT(affair.COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(affair.COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m')<=:endTime END) GROUP BY (CASE WHEN 2=affair.state THEN DATE_FORMAT(affair.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m') WHEN 4=affair.state THEN DATE_FORMAT(affair.COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m') END),col.templete_Id ORDER BY 时间

getTopTemplete.sql1: SELECT col.TEMPLETE_ID as 'templeteId',template.SUBJECT as 'TemplateName' FROM Ctp_Affair affair INNER JOIN Col_Summary col ON affair.object_Id=col.id and affair.BODY_TYPE=20 INNER JOIN Org_Member member ON affair.member_Id=member.id AND member.id=:user INNER JOIN CTP_TEMPLATE template ON col.TEMPLETE_ID IS NOT NULL AND col.TEMPLETE_ID=template.id WHERE affair.app=1 AND affair.state IN (:state) AND affair.is_delete=0 AND col.TEMPLETE_ID IS NOT NULL AND (CASE WHEN 2=affair.state THEN :startTime<=DATE_FORMAT(affair.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(affair.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m')<=:endTime WHEN 4=affair.state THEN :startTime<=DATE_FORMAT(affair.COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(affair.COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m')<=:endTime END) GROUP BY col.TEMPLETE_ID,template.SUBJECT ORDER BY count(*) desc
